io.smudgr.app.controller

Interface AppControl

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Controllable, ProjectItem, ReflectableType
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CurrentSourceControl, RecordGIFControl, SaveFrameControl, SaveProjectControl, SourceLibraryControl

    public interface AppControl
extends Controllable, ReflectableType
    Interface for defining controllable app behavior and/or actions.
    See Also:
    Controllable

    • Method Detail

      • getTypeCategoryIdentifier

        default java.lang.String getTypeCategoryIdentifier()
        Description copied from interface: ReflectableType
        This should return a unique identifier of the category of this type.

        The name that this type category is identified to the user with may differ from this identifier. This concept is similar to a 'slug'.

        Implementations of a type should not override this method.

        The String returned by this method should not be changed between versions.

        Specified by:
        getTypeCategoryIdentifier in interface ReflectableType
        Returns:
        String that will enumerate this type category across versions of the application
        See Also:
        ReflectableType.getTypeIdentifier(), ReflectableType.getTypeCategoryName()

      • getTypeCategoryName

        default java.lang.String getTypeCategoryName()
        Description copied from interface: ReflectableType
        The user identifiable name of the category of this type.

        This name can safely be changed between versions of the application, and may be used for translations.

        Implementations of this type should not override this method.

        Specified by:
        getTypeCategoryName in interface ReflectableType
        Returns:
        String that will identify this type category to the user.
        See Also:
        ReflectableType.getTypeName(), ReflectableType.getTypeCategoryIdentifier()

      • getTypeIdentifier

        default java.lang.String getTypeIdentifier()
        Description copied from interface: ReflectableType
        This should return a unique identifier of this type implementation.

        The name that this type implementation is identified to the user with may differ from this identifier. This concept is similar to a 'slug'.

        Implementations of a type should use this method to distinguish themselves.

        The String returned by this method should be changed between versions.

        Specified by:
        getTypeIdentifier in interface ReflectableType
        Returns:
        String that will enumerate this implementation across versions of the application
        See Also:
        ReflectableType.getTypeCategoryIdentifier(), ReflectableType.getTypeName()
